channel.title: [PI] Need help with the compiler [PI]
channel.description:
okay so the code i am using is [code] @echo off COLOR C title Compile Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause [/code] and the that is where the javac.exe is so its not a mapping thing then the error i get once i try running it is [code] javac: file not found: *java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue [/code]
now your gonna say go read the pinned threat but i did and that shows nothing because it says to but the code exactly how i have it but im still getting a error msg
:|NOTE: :| If anyone wants to make some easy money by helping me finish off this server msg me on skype MartinSokolDodaj

That has absolutely nothing to do with his issue.

item.title: [PI] Need help with the compiler [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Martiiinn Martiiinn
item.description:
@Martiiinn wrote:

okay so the code i am using is

@echo off
COLOR C
title Compile Server
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

and the that is where the javac.exe is so its not a mapping thing
then the error i get once i try running it is

javac: file not found: *java
Usage: javac <options> <source files>
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue

now your gonna say go read the pinned threat but i did and that shows nothing because it says to but the code exactly how i have it but im still getting a error msg

:|NOTE: If anyone wants to make some easy money by helping me finish off this server msg me on skype MartinSokolDodaj
